participant_1.name: Oliver
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Oliver is focused on his career and values success. He tends to be serious but has a softer side that comes out with close friends.
participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. my parents are very wealthy bankers. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year. i drive a bmw.

participant_2.name: Jasmine
participant_2.personality: Jasmine is fun-loving and quirky, with a great sense of humor. She enjoys gaming and has an adventurous spirit when it comes to trying new things.
participant_2.background: i play a lot of call of duty. my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i like donuts. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.
